FuncDef:
The diameter case-sensitive predefined-rule edsg command enables a device to distinguish between uppercase and lowercase names of predefined EDSG rules sent by a Diameter server.
The undo diameter case-sensitive predefined-rule edsg command disables a device from distinguishing between uppercase and lowercase names of predefined EDSG rules sent by a Diameter server.
By default, a device does not distinguish between uppercase and lowercase names of predefined EDSG rules sent by a Diameter server.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To enable a device to distinguish between uppercase and lowercase names of predefined EDSG rules sent by a Diameter server, run the diameter case-sensitive predefined-rule edsg command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
